activities: G2Planet, Inc. helps companies through the use of web applications designed to allow registration of attendees at conferences and events.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: G2Planet, Inc. uses eTRUST's dispute resolution services. Per our privacy policy, visitors may email G2Planet directly, or may use the eTRUST complaint form at http://www.etrust.org/complaint/raise_privacy_complaint.php?url=g2planet.com
